title: Шоу Воли
overview: Every week, Pavel, together with invited guests - stars and the most ordinary people - will sum up the results of the outgoing week and do it in his signature humorous manner in the best traditions of TNT. In each issue, viewers will learn about the most interesting events that have taken place in the world, as well as hear opinions from stars and presenters.Volya Show promises to amaze with bold experiments and fresh formats. Every Sunday, viewers will be treated to a real attraction of daring humor on the topic of the day, interactive with the participation of top stars, absurd contests, unexpected musical experiences and just a lot of fun with Pavel Volya and his guests.
